description.narrative: Human resources Capacities Available for programme effectiveness, which contributes to Climate Change, Disaster Risks And Envionmental Degradation, Environmental Sustainability (Covid). UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Communications, Advocacy And Public Engagement. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: By 2021, more children and their families are living in an open defecation free environment, using improved drinking water sources and adopting improved hygiene practices

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: Human resources Capacities Available for programme effectiveness

description.narrative: The UNICEF WASH programme in Sudan maintained a staffing structure defined in the country programme. Additional technical support was provided through consultancies and a standby partner arrangement across UNICEF Sudan offices. A total of 28 WASH staff members are onboard with two vacant positions for which the recruitment process is in the final stage. An additional two temporary positions were through the standby partner arrangement for over 3 months and 11 consultants were hired to fill staffing gaps.The human resource capacity in the section meets most of the diversity requirements except for gender parity, with 29% female members. | Status:Met | As-of Date:18/01/2022
